text: [Music]
hi I'm Olga I am the head of AWS design
system and I've been with AWS for almost
10 years now
our customers are all the teams within
AWS that are building AWS products
as a design system we deliver reusable
user interface components as well as
user interface guidelines for how to
build AWS services
before joining AWS I like to joke that
I'm a developer by education but a
designer by heart my first role at AWS
was a so-called design technologist
design prototyper from where On I moved
to ux design design management and then
I kind of made a full circle by now
managing both software as well as design
team
the most exciting part of my role is
working with exceptional people so it is
just so amazing to be able to come to a
workplace a work environment where you
actually really enjoy working with the
folks it is always day one so we have
that saying at AWS that you should feel
like on the same day that you had joined
AWS so really be excited about what
you're doing have that growth mindset of
I want to change things I want to
deliver things I want to make things
happen
so when I joined I imagined and what we
would do is uh you know get some tasks
from Seattle and then start executing on
them and I was again positively
surprised because uh when we got a
project the product really happens from
A to Z within Germany
we deliver a product that is used across
AWS entirely so not just AWS Germany but
across the world
